titles.title: Small Business Tax Equity Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow deductions and credits relating to expenditures in connection with marijuana sales conducted in compliance with State law.
Small Business Tax Equity Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

reference.ref: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure:CR S2249

bill.summary:
Small Business Tax Equity Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt a trade or business that conducts marijuana sales in compliance with state law from the prohibition against allowing business-related tax credits or deductions for expenditures in connection with trafficking in controlled substances.
